    • Method Detail

      • writeToCSV

        public static void writeToCSV(java.lang.String fileName,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> reservations,
                              boolean overwrite)
        Writes data into CSV files. This will create the file and add a header if it doesn't exist or if it is being overwritten.
        Parameters:
        fileName - the name of the file being written into
        reservations - list of reservations that will be saved into the file
        overwrite - option to overwrite the file instead of appending to it

      • readFromCSV

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Reservation> readFromCSV(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads data from CSV file
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the file being read
        Returns:
        list of reservations read from the file

      • readReservation

        public static Reservation readReservation(java.lang.String reservationNum,
                                          java.lang.String filename)
        Reads data from CSV in search for a specific reservation
        Parameters:
        reservationNum - the reservation number by which the correct reservation is identified
        filename - the name of the file being read by the method
        Returns:
        Reservation with the appropriate reservation number

      • deleteReservation

        public static void deleteReservation(Reservation reservation,
                                     java.lang.String hotelName)
        Deletes a single reservation from CSV
        Parameters:
        reservation - the reservation being deleted
        hotelName - name of the hotel in which the reservation was made

      • checkCSV

        public static void checkCSV(java.time.LocalDate today,
                            java.util.ArrayList<Hotel> hotels)
        Makes sure that all CSV files are up to date. Deletes stays from 7+ years ago. Deletes cancellations from 30+ days ago. Moves reservations to stays after 30 days.
        Parameters:
        today - today's date used to compare check in, out and cancellation dates
        hotels - list of hotels the check is happening for
